messages.subject: Re: Torch Songs
messages.msgSnippet: ... Maybe folk songs? We have a couple of videos of Peter, Paul, and Mary in concert, and one of them has both of these songs on it. My kids love these
messages.messageBody:
-- Tammy Graves <tgraves@...> wrote:
> Would "Puff the Magic Dragon" and "Beep Beep" be
> considered Torch songs? My
> girls love these

Maybe folk songs? We have a couple of videos of Peter,
Paul, and Mary in concert, and one of them has both of
these songs on it. My kids love these too:-)<<<<


Here are two definitions from www.dictionary.com
torch song (t�rch s�ng)
n. Music
A sentimental love song, typically one in which the singer laments a lost love.

torch song n : a popular song concerned with disappointment in love


Source: WordNet � 1.6, � 1997 Princeton University
